full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RJE BTZUN SGROL MA DKAR MO TSE SBYIN YID BZHIN 'KHOR LO MNYES PAR BYED PA'I MCHOD CHOG TSE DPAL RAB RGYAS ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO,, ,,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @035A *, ,(CES RJE BTZUN SGROL MA DKAR MO TSE SBYIN YID BZHIN 'KHOR LO @035B MNYES PAR BYED PA'I CHO GA TSE DPAL RAB RGYAS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DENG DUS MCHOG DMAN KUN LA SHIN TU NYE BAR MKHO YANG 'JUG PA BDE BA'I CHO GA BSGRIGS ZHIG MI SNANG BAS, TSUL 'DI LTA BU ZHIG BYUNG NA, RANG GZHAN MANG PO LA PHAN THOGS CHE BAR MTHONG NAS, DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYIS MDZAD PA'I BSNYEN SGRUB MCHOG CHOG SOGS KYI YIG CHA DU MA'I LEGS CHA DANG SNYING PO BSDUS TE, RGYAS BSDUS 'TSAM ZHING LAG TU BLANG BDE BAR, BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI GSUNG GI BDUD RTZIS LEGS PAR 'TSO BA'I BTZUN GZUGS, DAM TSIG RDO RJE 'AM MING GZHAN TSE RING RDO RJE GRAGS SU 'BOD PAS BSIL LDAN LJONGS KYI LTE BA DPAL LHA LDAN GYI GNAS CHEN DU YAR NGO'I ZLA TSES BZANG POR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI CHOS LA 'DUN PA'I DPYOD LDAN @036A *, ,DGE TSUL YON TAN RGYA MTSOS BGYIS PA 'DIS KYANG RGYAL BSTAN DAR ZHING DE 'DZIN GYI SKYES BU DAM PA RNAMS SKU TSE ZHABS PAD BRTAN PA LA BRTEN NAS 'GRO BA KUN LA PHAN BDE'I LEGS TSOGS RING DU RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,)
